forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 18C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. Slight chance of a rain shower. High near 65F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this evening, then becoming cloudy after midnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 12C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 54F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with light rain early. High 18C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain...mainly in the morning. High near 65F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Slight chance of a shower throughout the evening. Low 11C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Slight chance of a shower throughout the evening. Low 53F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 19C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 68F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 11C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 53F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 19C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 67F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies in the evening then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 12C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low around 55F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High 18C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. High 66F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early with showers later at night. Low 12C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early with showers later at night. Low around 55F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 18C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 66F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 12C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low around 55F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 18C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 66F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low 12C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early. Areas of fog developing after midnight. Low near 55F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 19C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 67F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies early will give way to low clouds and fog after midnight. Low 12C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low 54F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 18C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High near 65F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then becoming foggy and damp late. Low 12C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low 54F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers in the morning, then clouds lingering in the afternoon. High 18C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning with some clearing in the afternoon. High 66F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low 12C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later at night. Low near 55F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
